full_text:
Probable Cause Affidavit
Palm Beach Police Department
Agency ORI# FLO 500600

Defendant: Haley Robson Police Case#: 05-368 (2)
Race/Sex: White / Female DOB: 04-09-1986
Charges: Lewd and Lascivious Act on victim under 16 years of age. FSS 800.04 (6)(2b)

On March 15, 2005, The victim, a 14 year old female, reported to the Palm Beach Police Department that she was brought to 358 El Brillo Way, in Palm Beach, Jeffrey Epstein's house for the purpose of engaging in sexual activity with to Epstein. This arrangement was organized by Haley Robson.

The victim advised she was aware that Robson was working for a subject, named "Jeff" who lived in Palm Beach. She was also aware that Robson had previously stated she did sexual favors for "Jeff" in the past. Robson had offered the victim an opportunity to make good money. "Jeff" was later identified as Jeffrey Epstein.

During a sworn taped statement, the victim stated, on February 6, 2005, Haley Robson came to the victims house and picked the victim up. During the drive to Palm Beach, Robson told the victim that should "Jeff" ask her for her age, to state she was eighteen. Upon arriving at the house at 358 El Brillo they were allowed entry into the house. The victim was introduced to Epstein and was led upstairs to the bedroom area. Once inside the bedroom, the victim was instructed to wait for Epstein. Shortly hereafter, Epstein entered the bedroom wearing only a towel. Epstein instructed the victim to massage his back and laid naked on the massage table in his bedroom dropping the towel he had on. As the victim, began to massage Epstein on his back area, Epstein instructed her to remove her clothing. The victim, removed her clothing, remaining only in her bra and thong underwear. Epstein laid on the table naked and further told her to get up on his back to massage his back. The victim straddled his waist and massaged his back. The victim advised her buttocks were touching his buttocks.

Epstein turned over on his back, the victim was now standing beside him, and she massaged his chest . Epstein began masturbating himself while she rubbed his chest. The victim stated that as she was rubbing his chest, Epstein produced a purple vibrator and began to massage the victims vagina area with the vibrator. The victim stated Epstein ejaculated and wiped himself with the towel he had on previously. Epstein allegedly told the victim, that Haley Robson had worked for him for many years.

The foregoing instrument was sworn to or affirmed before me this 20 day of September, 2005 by Det. Joe Recarey ,who is personally known to me. State of Florida County of Palm Beach

Signature/Arresting Officer

Date: 09/20/2005

Signature of Police Officer (F.S.S. 117.10)

07/26/17 Page1 of 4 Page 32 of 135 PPublic Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00031205

additional_notes: The document appears to be a scanned copy of a Probable Cause Affidavit from the Palm Beach Police Department. The document is dated September 20, 2005, and details allegations against Haley Robson and Jeffrey Epstein. The document is page 1 of 4 and page 32 of 135.
